channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
Hello my name is xlo, i am currently a mod on the 525 pur3zscape. what i need help with is making it so that we never get login glitched again. This happens every once and a while, people can stay logined in, but no one else can login to play. It is rlly messing up how server.
Please post anything that may help
thank you xlo

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

mines does the same thing and the only thing i can figure out how 2 fix is to reset the server

Read full topic
